title: Unique & Unusual Ingots
description: Elevate your game's crafting and commerce experience with our meticulously designed collection of over 100 unique and unusual ingot icons.
longDescription:
Elevate your game's crafting and commerce experience with our meticulously designed collection of over 100 unique and unusual ingot icons. Tailored for the imaginative game developer, this set captures the allure of treasured metals and the wonder of alchemical transformation in vivid detail.


Key Features:


  • Expansive Selection: Dive into a diverse trove of over 100 icons, from arcane alloys to mythical metals.


  • Exquisite Craftsmanship: Each ingot design gleams with sharp, intricate details ensuring every icon not only fits but enhances your game's aesthetics.


  • Adaptable for Various Genres: From fantasy RPGs to interstellar trade simulators, these ingots can find a home in any gaming universe.


  • Great Value: With a price tag of just $24.99, enhance your game's visual appeal without straining your budget.


With the Unique & Unusual Ingots collection, you're not just adding icons; you're imbuing your game with tales of distant forges, legendary smiths, and markets teeming with adventurers and merchants. Make each trade, craft, and discovery memorable. Secure this captivating collection today and let your players revel in the richness of each ingot's story.


Technical Information:


101 Individual PNG's with transparent backgrounds
technicalDetails:
101 Individual PNG's with transparent backgrounds

Image sizes: 2048px by 2048px

This pack has been developed with the assistance of generative AI software, Photoshop & Lightroom
